Articles.Content:
Wannabe Scientist in training reports for duty

Hello everyone, I am Draken (21) a physics student from germany. Since i have got an enhanced affinity to computer games and space crafts (how suprising ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)) i got interested in this game when a friend showed it to me. So here i am, for further details on my person mail me.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launchings!

Skunky

Moin, moin! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Wir werden ja immer mehr...
